Description: Base and wall sherd of Chian pottery type B kantharos; creamy slip; interior: glazed streaky black with remains of added white; exterior reserved; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The sherd fits Williams' (1983, 169) typology for the Type B kantharos also found on Aegina. Williams, D. ‘Aigina, Aphaia-Tempel 5. The pottery from Chios’, Archäologischer Anzeiger 1983.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1816) (phase 2)
